text: The 1947 World Table Tennis Championships – Men's Doubles was the 14th edition of the men's doubles championship. Bohumil Váňa and Adolf Šlár won the title after defeating Johnny Leach and Jack Carrington in the final by three sets to nil. ==Results== ==See also== List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== -
title: 1947 World Table Tennis Championships – Men's Doubles
